status.sessionStorageNote: Session storage only - export to save permanently

save.title: Save Diagram (Current Session Only)
save.warningMessage: This save is temporary and will be lost when you close the browser.
save.warningExport: Use Export File to permanently save your work.

load.title: Load Diagram (Current Session Only)
load.noteMessage: These saves are temporary. Export your diagrams to keep them permanently.
load.noSavedDiagrams: No saved diagrams found in this session

export.title: Export Diagram
export.recommendedMessage: This is the best way to save your work permanently.
export.noteMessage: Exported JSON files can be imported later or shared with others.

alert.diagramExists: A diagram named "{{name}}" already exists in this session. This will overwrite it. Are you sure you want to continue?
alert.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Continue loading?
alert.unsavedChangesExport: You have unsaved changes. Export your diagram first to save it. Continue?
alert.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this diagram?
alert.autoSaveFailed: Storage full! Please use Storage Manager to free up space.
alert.beforeUnload: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?
alert.quotaExceeded: Storage quota exceeded. Please export important diagrams and clear some space.
